testimonials.name: Rajesh Kumar
testimonials.quote: The placement cell at Sri Vasavi provided excellent guidance and training that helped me secure my dream job at Microsoft.

testimonials.name: Priya Sharma
testimonials.quote: The technical training and mock interviews prepared me well for the competitive selection process at Amazon.

testimonials.name: Vikram Reddy
testimonials.quote: Thanks to the placement cell, I was able to transition from mechanical to IT and start my career in software development.
